description: [PR Newswire] - LAS VEGAS, Feb. 2, 2017 /PRNewswire/ - Every three years, the construction industry descends upon Las Vegas for CONEXPO-CON/AGG, one of the largest trade shows in the world. "We hold four great auctions at our Las Vegas site each year, but our auction held during ConExpo every three years is different," said Ron Moss, Regional Sales Manager, Ritchie Bros. "In March 2014, we sold more than 2,300 items for 400 plus consignors, resulting in US$60+ million in gross auction proceeds—that still stands as our site record.
